text: Razorback is a 1984 Australian horror thriller movie directed by Russell Mulcahy and was based on the 1981 novel of the same name by Peter Brennan. It stars Gregory Harrison, Bill Kerr, Arkie Whiteley, Chris Haywood, David Argue, Judy Morris, John Ewart, Ben Roberts and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * *Razorback at Oz Movies *Razorback at the National Film and Sound Archive * Category:1984 horror movies Category:1984 thriller movies Category:1980s horror thriller movies Category:1980s monster movies Category:Australian horror movies Category:Australian thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Russell Mulcahy Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: Razorback (movie)
